statements: SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT scan_result FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_result = 'Confirmed';
SELECT id, scan_date FROM iris_scan_data ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT security_level FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_result = 'Approved';
SELECT id, scan_date FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_result = 'Denied' ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT security_level FROM iris_scan_data;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, scan_result FROM iris_scan_data WHERE security_level = 'High' AND scan_date > '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE scan_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT scan_id, scan_date, scan_results FROM iris_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE employee_id = 201 AND scan_results = 'Approved';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, access_level FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT scan_id, employee_id, scan_date FROM iris_scans WHERE scan_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, access_level FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND access_level IN ('Admin', 'Manager');
SELECT MAX(scan_date) AS latest_scan_date, COUNT(scan_id) AS total_scans FROM iris_scans WHERE employee_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans;
SELECT person_id, first_name, last_name FROM persons;
SELECT scan_timestamp, scan_id, person_id FROM iris_scans WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, person_id, access_time, access_result FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT person_id, first_name, last_name, security_clearance FROM persons WHERE security_clearance > 3;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT scan_id, person_id, scan_timestamp FROM iris_scans WHERE scan_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, security_clearance FROM persons WHERE security_clearance > 3 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT scan_id, person_id, scan_timestamp FROM iris_scans WHERE person_id = 2 AND scan_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT persons.first_name, access_logs.access_time, access_logs.access_result FROM persons INNER JOIN access_logs ON persons.person_id = access_logs.person_id;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans;
SELECT user_id, scan_result FROM iris_scans WHERE scan_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT measure_name, effectiveness_rating FROM security_measures WHERE implementation_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT user_id, entry_time, exit_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY entry_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM users WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT user_id, entry_time, exit_time FROM access_logs WHERE exit_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM security_measures WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY implementation_date ASC;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, s.scan_result FROM users u INNER JOIN iris_scans s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.scan_result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans;
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM employees;
SELECT department_name, department_id FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT scan_id, scan_timestamp, scan_result FROM iris_scans WHERE scan_result = 'match';
SELECT full_name, department FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department, access_level FROM employees WHERE department='IT' AND access_level > 2;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) FROM departments JOIN employees ON departments.department_id = employees.department GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT employees.full_name, departments.department_name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_id WHERE employees.access_level = 3;
SELECT scan_id, scan_timestamp, scan_result FROM scan_logs WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM scan_timestamp) = 8;
